tweet_text:
As I said in my piece, this is not about critical race theory in @GCISD curricula. 

In fact CRT was barely mentioned during the Monday meeting. 

The key endgame of CRT accusations is to try to purge non-white educators and their influence in schools.
text_en: As I said in my piece, this is not about critical race theory in curricula. In fact CRT was barely mentioned during the Monday meeting. The key endgame of CRT accusations is to try to purge non-white educators and their influence in schools.

tweet_text: @peterprouder9 @wisedingbat @Newaccccount1 @WojWatcher @BankerBun @LahavHarkov @marcrod97 IMHO AIPAC is a relic of the time when staying in the good graces of a superpower to the point of behaving as a pseudo-client state was the sensible geopolitical move. In that sense, AIPAC was just the necessary machinery. I think that time has long since passed, for sure.
text_en: IMHO AIPAC is a relic of the time when staying in the good graces of a superpower to the point of behaving as a pseudo-client state was the sensible geopolitical move. In that sense, AIPAC was just the necessary machinery. I think that time has long since passed, for sure.
